Bootstrap
=========

Nice standard styling. Summarizing their `getting started <https://getbootstrap.com>`_ page with a only css styling

.. code-block:: html

    <!doctype html>
    <html lang="en">
        <head>
            <!-- Required meta tags -->
            <meta charset="utf-8">
            <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, shrink-to-fit=no">

            <!-- Bootstrap CSS -->
            <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.4.1/css/bootstrap.min.css" integrity="sha384-Vkoo8x4CGsO3+Hhxv8T/Q5PaXtkKtu6ug5TOeNV6gBiFeWPGFN9MuhOf23Q9Ifjh" crossorigin="anonymous">

            <title>Bootstrap</title>
        </head>

        <body>
            <div class="container">
                <h1>Particle Home</h1>
            </div>
        </body>

    </html>

`Buttons <https://getbootstrap.com/docs/4.4/components/buttons/>`_ and responsive `layout <https://getbootstrap.com/docs/4.4/layout/grid/>`_ are most used currently
